text: José Acuña Bautista Sr., popularly known as Ramon Revilla Sr. or simply Ramon Revilla (March 8, 1927 – June 26, 2020),Maragay, Feliciano V. More Caloocan Poll Fraud Bared. Manila Standard, April 23, 1987, p. 6. Google News Archive accessed April 4, 2011 was a Filipino actor and politician. He was Senator from 1992 to 2004. Revilla Sr. was a member of the Lakas. He was born in Imus, Cavite. An actor, he was best known for his roles in Iyo ang Tondo Kanya ang Cavite, Arrest: Pat. Rizal Alih – Zamboanga Massacre and Exodus: Tales from the Enchanted Kingdom. Revilla Sr. died from heart failure on June 26, 2020 in Manila, aged 93. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Filipino actors Category:Politicians from Cavite
title: Ramon Revilla Sr.
